comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: The caption, somewhat legible, on several of these photos, says "3/4/13", corresponding to the first inauguration of President Woodrow Wilson, March 4, 1913, as noted, for instance, in this source and also the date is noted by the Library of Congress.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Cotinis: Thank you for the information about Wilson's first inauguration. We will update our source data and reload the description.
